description: Flexible dual use of the crown level (Levels 29 and 30) as either Office Amenity (Class E) or Restaurant (Class E) / Bar (Sui Generis). Use of the ground floor entrance fronting Cardinal Place and part of the basement as Office Amenity (Class E) and Restaurant (Class E) / Bar (Sui Generis). Provision of short-stay cycle parking in the public realm and associated works.

superseding_details.unit_reference: Part of the basement, the Ground Floor entrance fronting Bressenden Place, and Levels 29 and 30
